1 //Namespace
  2 var EarthServerGenericClient = EarthServerGenericClient || {};
  3 
  4 /**
  5  * @ignore <-- REMOVE ME FOR DOCUMENTATION
  6  * @class Scene Model: <Add Description>
  7  * <amount of service urls + coverages>
  8  * @augments EarthServerGenericClient.AbstractSceneModel
  9  */
 10 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_Name = function()
 11 {
 12     this.setDefaults();
 13     this.name = "Some Name";
 14 
 15     //Initialise variables her
 16     //this.var = 0;
 17 };
 18 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_Name.inheritsFrom( EarthServerGenericClient.AbstractSceneModel );
 19 
 20 //A function for URL(s)
 21 //EarthServerGenericClient.Model_Name.prototype.setURLs=function(URL1,..)
 22 
 23 //A function for Coverage(s)
 24 //EarthServerGenericClient.Model_Name.prototype.setCoverages = function (coverage1, ...)
 25 
 26 //A function for Version(s)
 27 //EarthServerGenericClient.Model_Name.prototype.setxxxVersion = function (version)
 28 
 29 //Any additional functions
 30 //EarthServerGenericClient.Model_Name.prototype.functionName = function(parameters)
 31 
 32 /**
 33  * @ignore <-- REMOVE ME FOR DOCUMENTATION
 34  * Creates the x3d geometry and appends it to the given root node. This is done automatically by the SceneManager.
 35  * @param root - X3D node to append the model.
 36  * @param cubeSizeX - Size of the fishtank/cube on the x-axis.
 37  * @param cubeSizeY - Size of the fishtank/cube on the y-axis.
 38  * @param cubeSizeZ - Size of the fishtank/cube on the z-axis.
 39  * @param index - Index of this model in the SceneManager list.
 40  */
 41 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_Name.prototype.createModel=function(root, index, cubeSizeX, cubeSizeY, cubeSizeZ){
 42     if( root === undefined)
 43         alert("root is not defined");
 44 
 45     this.cubeSizeX = cubeSizeX;
 46     this.cubeSizeY = cubeSizeY;
 47     this.cubeSizeZ = cubeSizeZ;
 48 
 49     this.root = root;
 50     this.index = index;
 51 
 52     //Create Placeholder
 53     this.placeHolder = this.createPlaceHolder();
 54     this.root.appendChild( this.placeHolder );
 55 
 56     //1: Check if mandatory values are set
 57     /*if( this.var === undefined || ....)
 58     {
 59         alert("Not all mandatory values are set. ModuleDescription: " + this.name );
 60         console.log(this);
 61         return;
 62     }*/
 63 
 64     //2: Make ServerRequest
 65     /* Exmaple:
 66     EarthServerGenericClient.requestWMSImageWCSDem(this,bb,this.XResolution,this.ZResolution,
 67         this.URLWMS,this.coverageImage,this.WMSVersion,this.CRS,this.imageFormat,
 68         this.URLDEM,this.coverageDEM,this.WCSVersion);
 69         */
 70 };
 71 
 72 /**
 73  * @ignore <-- REMOVE ME FOR DOCUMENTATION
 74  * This is a callback method as soon as the ServerRequest in createModel() has received it's data.
 75  * This is done automatically.
 76  * @param data - Received data from the ServerRequest.
 77  */
 78 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_Name.prototype.receiveData= function( data)
 79 {
 80     if( this.checkReceivedData(data))
 81     {
 82         //Remove the placeHolder
 83         this.removePlaceHolder();
 84 
 85         var YResolution = (parseFloat(data.maxHMvalue) - parseFloat(data.minHMvalue) );
 86         var transform = this.createTransform(data.width,YResolution,data.height,parseFloat(data.minHMvalue));
 87         this.root.appendChild( transform);
 88 
 89         //Set transparency
 90         data.transparency = this.transparency;
 91 
 92         //Create Terrain out of the received data
 93         //Example LOD Terrain
 94         //this.terrain = new EarthServerGenericClient.LODTerrain(transform, data, this.index);
 95         //this.terrain.createTerrain();
 96 
 97     }
 98 };
 99

105  * @param modelNumber - Number of this model in the SceneManager.
106  */
107 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_Name.prototype.setSpecificElement= function(element,modelNumber)
108 {
109     //Example:
110     //EarthServerGenericClient.appendElevationSlider(element,modelNumber);
111 };
